```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

## Data Wrangling


``` {r}
# data Loading 

survey <- read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2021/2021-05-18/survey.csv')

country <- survey%>%
  distinct(country)

# Workshpop 4

survey%>%
  count(country, sort = TRUE)

survey_short <- survey %>% 
  filter(
    country=='United States' |
      country == 'USA' |
      country == 'US' |
      country == 'U.S.' |
      country == 'Usa' |
      country == "United States of America"
      )
survey_short %>% 
  filter(
    annual_salary > 50000 &
      gender == "Woman"
  )

survey_short %>% 
  select(how_old_are_you,
         annual_salary,
         industry,
         gender
         ) %>% filter(
           gender == "Woman"
         ) %>% count(
          industry, sort = TRUE
         )
  

```
